item.description:
Bob and I will be staying local this weekend. The guys want to climb the falls which is known for the ice. This is just 1 mile from the trailhead.

I'll have my crampons available but will do the easier stuff.

Many water springs on this mountain so traction probably will be needed more than snowshoes this weekend. No goals, just out to have fun.
item.how_to_find_us: call me @ 603-477-5116/text We would meet at the trailhead at the end of cascade falls rd. It's posted, but go left at the fork in the rd.
item.name: Ascutney, via Cascade Falls hike/ice climbing/beer
